version_description: Hey there Ping Pongers! We’ve increased matchmaking stability in Power Ping Pong so now it plays better than ever.

Sensei here, telling you young grasshopper’s about a new update for Power Ping Pong

Sensei has become one with the controls and they are now better than ever
Sensei has Kung Fu kicked many bugs out of the game. Now it plays better than ever.

Now back to Ping Pong!
